product_name: Brooks Infiniti Capri Pants III - Women's
long_description: The Brooks Infiniti III capris feature performance fabric to help keep you dry and comfortable and a pocket to hold your tunes so you can feel the beat while you log the miles on your trail runs. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. Rear zippered pocket protects contents from moisture and is sized to fit a music player like a smartphone or dedicated media player. Wide waistband with elastic cord provides a flattering, personalized fit; silicone leg grippers help keep capris in place. Internal waistband pocket holds a key. Reflective detailing increases visibility in dim light from any angle. The Brooks Infiniti III capris offer a close-to-body, athletic fit.
short_description: The Brooks Infiniti III capris feature performance fabric to help keep you dry and comfortable and a pocket to hold your tunes so you can feel the beat while you log the miles on your trail runs.
